name: Welcome to Corporater
description: A quick introduction to the Corporater interface

steps.title: Welcome to ClickPath!
steps.content: This guided tour will help you navigate the application. Use the Next button to continue, or Skip to exit at any time.

steps.title: Navigation Menu
steps.content: Use the navigation menu to access different modules like Risks, Controls, and Objectives.

steps.title: Quick Search
steps.content: Use the search bar to quickly find any object in the system. Try searching for a risk or control name.

steps.title: Your Profile
steps.content: Click here to access your profile settings, preferences, and to log out.

steps.title: Need More Help?
steps.content: Click the ? button in the bottom-right corner at any time to restart this tour or access help documentation.
